title: Add PC builds section with gaming PC and hacking PC

requirements.summary: Create a new ProductCategorySection for PC builds showcasing two pre-built systems: a gaming PC (9.3GB) and a hacking PC (12.8GB)
acceptanceCriteria: New PC builds section appears on the homepage below the existing product categories
Section displays two product cards: one for gaming PC with 9.3GB specification and one for hacking PC with 12.8GB specification
PC builds section follows the same visual design pattern as mice, keyboards, and monitors sections with neon accents
Each PC card includes name, description, icon, and key specifications matching the existing ProductCard component structure

file_operations.description: Add a new ProductCategorySection instance for PC builds below the monitors section using the pcBuilds data array with red accent color and the generated banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/pc-builds-banner.dim_1200x400.png. Set the section id to 'pc-builds' for navigation targeting.

requirements.summary: Add PC builds data to frontend/src/data/products.ts with gaming PC (9.3GB) and hacking PC (12.8GB) specifications
acceptanceCriteria: New pcBuilds array exported from products.ts file
Gaming PC entry includes name, description, computer icon, and 9.3GB storage specification
Hacking PC entry includes name, description, computer icon, and 12.8GB storage specification
PC build entries follow the same Product interface structure as existing mice, keyboards, and monitors

file_operations.description: Export a new pcBuilds array containing two Product objects: one gaming PC with 9.3GB storage specification and one hacking PC with 12.8GB storage specification. Use the Computer icon from lucide-react for both entries and include descriptive specs following the same pattern as existing product categories.

requirements.summary: Update HomePage component to render PC builds section with red neon accent color below the monitors section
acceptanceCriteria: HomePage.tsx imports and uses pcBuilds data from products.ts
New ProductCategorySection component instance added for PC builds with id 'pc-builds'
PC builds section uses red accent color (consistent with existing neon color palette)
Section appears in correct order on the page after monitors section

file_operations.description: Import pcBuilds from the products data file and render a ProductCategorySection for PC builds below the monitors section. Pass the generated banner image frontend/public/assets/generated/pc-builds-banner.dim_1200x400.png, use 'red' as the accent color, set id to 'pc-builds', and include appropriate title and description for the PC builds category.

requirements.summary: Update Header navigation to include PC Builds link that scrolls to the new PC builds section
acceptanceCriteria: PC Builds navigation item added to Header component menu
Clicking PC Builds link smoothly scrolls to the pc-builds section
Navigation link appears in both desktop and mobile menus
Link styling matches existing navigation items with hover effects

file_operations.description: Add a PC Builds navigation item to both the desktop navigation menu and mobile navigation menu. Configure the link to scroll to the 'pc-builds' section using the existing smooth scroll functionality. Ensure the styling matches the existing navigation items with hover effects and proper spacing.

requirements.summary: Update Footer navigation to include PC Builds category link
acceptanceCriteria: PC Builds button added to Categories section in Footer
Button scrolls to pc-builds section when clicked
Button styling matches existing category buttons

file_operations.description: Add a PC Builds button to the Categories section in the Footer component. Configure the button to scroll to the 'pc-builds' section using the existing scroll functionality. Ensure the button styling matches the existing category buttons for Mice, Keyboards, and Monitors.
